website_summaries.verdict: The ultimate vegan replacement for traditional jerky, Primal Spirit’s meaty taste, 10 grams of plant protein, and excellent value are well worth a try.
pros: Six savory flavors include Hot & Spicy, Hickory, Mesquite Lime, Teriyaki, Texas Barbecue, and Thai Peanut
cons: A little pricey, but you get what you pay for

customer_reviews.title: TOO MANY NEGATIVE REVIEWS
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful, and I urge you to ignore the negativity. I have come to realize that miserable people just need the company! This product is very sweet, as teriyaki is supposed to be. It has a nice "meaty" texture and taste. As a vegan for moral reasons, it is hard to find tasty, affordable vegan products with respectable ingredients, so I am GRATEFUL that this company has met all three criteria. And I will be back to try other flavors!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Best 100% Wheat Gluten Jerky I Can Find!
customer_reviews.text: The Teriyaki Primal Strips are made of nearly 100% yummy, healthy wheat gluten and are one of the only vegan meat substitutes I can tolerate well (because I can't eat much soy without having horrid intestinal cramps that feel like being perpetually kicked in the gut by flaming hooves...). So, if you, like me, are soy intolerant and want a great-tasting vegan meat substitute (that hasn't jumped on the stupid "gluten free" hype train), look no further than the Teriyaki primal strips. (If, however, you are one of those who suffer from Celiac's disease or have a wheat allergy, stick to the soy-based primal strips, like the Hickery Smoked ones I can't eat.)
customer_reviews.author: Pamela T.

customer_reviews.title: Was a great product, but progressively becoming unedable.
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend and I have ordered this product many times in past couple years and absolutely loved it. However, we've noticed the consistency (hardness and dryness) has been worse the last few times we ordered these, especially this last time. We were unable to eat half of the jerky because it's like chewing on cartilage that is not willing to break down. This used to be a great product for my vegetarian and vegan friends, but as of lately, it has not been worth it if we can't eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great tasty snack
customer_reviews.text: I've bought these for a long time and was happy to see a value pack available on amazon. The teriyaki flavor is good, not overly sweet just right. They were fresh, not too chewy, sometimes I've gotten them where they are too firm like they aren't very fresh, but these were great. I'm not a vegetarian anymore, but I still like these as a snack and usually carry one in my purse, or in my backpack when hiking. The other flavors are good too. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MuchaKoda

customer_reviews.title: Delish.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was so skeptical buying these and even more skeptical to try them when I got the box and smelled how strong they smell even from the outside. But WOW I am so glad I did bc they are amazingggggg. I’m hooked. I was so worried about the consistency too but it’s honestly perfect and pleasant. And the flavor is bomb. (Mesquite lime). Just bought the 24 pack. As a vegetarian it’s so hard to find snacks with good macros so I’m super thankful I found these
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and even life changing, really!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these a while back, but decided to leave a review. I ordered them after a vegan group came to my campus and gave these out along with other vegan snacks. I was like, "Oh greeaat, this is gonna taste like garbage." But when I tried it I had to double check the ingredients. The texture and taste was so similar to regular beef jerky and I was blown away and couldn't stop craving one. A few months later now, I've swapped to being a vegetarian, not fully vegan, but I'm working on it. And I really give credit to these for opening my mind to meatless foods!
customer_reviews.author: Skyla Shugart

customer_reviews.title: Better than real beef jerky!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these to try to curb away from eating as much meat and potentially slowly transition into a full vegan diet, fully expecting them not to taste as good as one of my favorite snacks, beef jerky. To my surprise, these not only provide the same level of protein and far better nutrition, but they're absolutely delicious!!! The texture, taste, and toughness are absolutely perfect, and I see myself throwing a handful of these in my backpack anytime I go hiking or just need a snack because these are irresistible!
customer_reviews.author: 2shotproductions

customer_reviews.title: Great snack for the protein
customer_reviews.text: I love this vegan jerky and you can't beat the 10 grams of protein for 74 calories. I wish there was a way to get rid of all of the plastic. There is no option with plastic. Someone has to do something. I don't understand why there are no better options for food when I use biodegradeable bags for garbage with no problems. Come on.
customer_reviews.author: Sulitha NoNo

customer_reviews.title: Great, but...
customer_reviews.text: I had this product a long while back, and I remember it being very tasty. However, I've since developed a peanut allergy. That's where the "but" comes in... There is a peanut flavor Primal Strip, but nowhere on the packaging does the company warn that it's made on the same equipment; I had already ordered and received the item when a friend told me it was. I contacted the company. It is in fact made on the same equipment. The product is great, but if you're very sensitive to peanuts, be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Avery

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first non-meat jerky I have tasted, and it was really delicious. I would bet that most people tasting it would not realize it is plant based. It is not dry like regular jerky, it has kind of a barbecue sauce on it but the jerky itself is moist and chewy. Keep a napkin handy. I got the variety pack first to taste all of them, but since my husband and I both like the teriyaki the best, when I reordered, I bought only the one flavor. My only issue with it is that the pieces are small and very expensive for what you get (basically 4 bites in each pack).
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: love these!
customer_reviews.text: I've been vegetarian for 21 years and I'm always trying new meat alternatives. I couldn't live without these delicious snacks. I love all the flavors but Texas BBQ and hickory smoked are my favorites. I love the spicy one too it is drier and more slim Jim textured and less chewy than the other soy ones. I love them all so much I get them by the box in every flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Danita Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived next day and as described
customer_reviews.text: I love this jerky but its so hard to find under the best of circumstances, and impossible right now. I was delighted to find a 24 pack on Amazon for cheaper per piece than I can get anywhere else. I ordered the Teriyaki flavor because its mild enough for my 8 year old, and was so happy it arrived the next day. Great product and great seller.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo yummy!
customer_reviews.text: The hickory smoked are the most delicious things. I have to be careful or I'll eat the whole box in less than two weeks. The only downside is all the plastic, I really wish I could buy these bulk packaged instead of individually packaged. I want to cut down on the plastic footprint of my foods and these are messing that up.
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: We like these as travel snacks
customer_reviews.text: We like these as travel snacks. For days when we are working out in the field or on long trips, we don't always want to pack a cooler with stuff and if we don't find a good place to eat - these tide us over perfectly. Got to remember to have dental floss with you for afterwards but they are a great snack. Ready to order another case today!
customer_reviews.author: Diana~

customer_reviews.title: Expensive Addiction!! Delicious!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful. Not gonna lie, the first bite my first world sass kicked in and said: "these are really sweet," and I was going through buyer's remorse for all of ten seconds before more spices released, I started to fall in love with the texture, and only have three left less than a week after receiving twelve...
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Lewis

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend these! They are a great snack after a workout or on-the-go. The packaging can be a little difficult to open, but the "meat" is worth ripping the darn things open with your teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Yo_Teach

customer_reviews.title: Chewy and tasty
customer_reviews.text: I buy these all the time and I am never disappointed. They used to sell them at Whole Foods but they don't carry them anymore, so I get them on Amazon. They don't have the hard texture like regular jerky, but the flavor is great, it's vegan and an easy to pack protein source.
customer_reviews.author: @dawgwriter

customer_reviews.title: Taste and texture are spot on!
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult to open, you need a scissor and then "squish" it around, but that's due to it being vacuum sealed, so acceptable. But, the taste and texture are absolutely spot on. I haven't had real jerky in decades, but I think this is how I remember it.
customer_reviews.author: amybeth7

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, great texture - great snack!
customer_reviews.text: Tried the variety pack of "jerkeys" but found the The Classics - Hickory Smoked and Texas BBQ, are my favorites. (Thai peanut is very good as well!). These are great size for a snack, and the texture is very chewy yet not tough, probably better than real jerky. And the taste is spot on! The value is a little of an issue (hence 4 star instead of 5) but hopefully will come down in price with greater sales and even pressure from competitors. Still, a nice treat now and then to sooth my need for jerky. So far the best I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Kroncke

customer_reviews.title: I found these years ago and they are the perfect protein snack to bring with you
customer_reviews.text: I could live on these things! I have been a vegetarian almost 30 years. I found these years ago and they are the perfect protein snack to bring with you. Good protein, low calorie and non perishable. I bring them on vacation as they pack easily. I have tried the other flavors, but this Thai Peanut one is the only one that I like. It says a lot that after years of eating these things I am not sick of them!
customer_reviews.author: K Lamel

customer_reviews.title: From a non-vegan, these are good
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been vegan for a few years now, so we have tried a ton of vegan products, lots of them are super gross to be honest haha but these are pretty good! The smoked hickory is our favorite and we have ordered the 24 pack multiple times. They hold up really well in the package too which is nice
customer_reviews.author: Cookster53

customer_reviews.title: Great product, the first two times ordered
customer_reviews.text: I really LOVED the taste and texture of this product the first two times that I ordered it, the third time was not a charm. The "jerky" taste stale! I was highly disappointed. This was a great go to snack, now I have to find another snack. 😑😑😑
customer_reviews.author: M. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: she was delighted to finally have the stuff the rest of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Yum. Close enough to meat for the receiver of this gift. Vegetarian since age 6, she was delighted to finally have the stuff the rest of the family eats (we eat the other stuff, but we've tried this and given it our stamp of approval). Thankful for Primal Spirit Foods for these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great treat for a Vegan
customer_reviews.text: My husband & I love the flavor, and texture, very similar to meat jerky, a bit high on the sodium if you are watching your salt intake, but if you're not, Go for it! Purchased mainly for our disaster relief bags, and a few to eat now. We may need to be constantly replacing them in our bags, we love them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping to like this...
customer_reviews.text: I'm always looking for new snacks for my office Vegans, so had high hopes for this, esp. with all the positive reviews, but this was not a hit! I ordered the teriyaki flavor (based on other reviews). I walked around the office cutting off pieces for folks to try, and so far no takers. We have dog Friday at our office and I did just read seitan is something a lot of folks feed their vegan dogs, so will be offering it to them, and then will not reorder. Seitan is wheat protein, so gluten allergy folks beware.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn R

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty and healthy jerky snack!
customer_reviews.text: Hi! I could eat a box of this vegan jerky at one sitting. Delicious! The hickory smoke flavor is mildly hot without burning. There's to be a hint of maple syrup or similar tasting spice in the flavor. Texture seems right. Chewy but soft enough. The strips came in an outer paper box. Easy enough to open. The individual wrappings are easy to open with scissors. Tougher to open by hand. Individual wrapping has a cut at top for peeling open. I had no luck that way. For taking these on a hike it's a good idea to bring scissors. I recommend this jerky for a great snacking experience. I hope to buy other flavors in future orders.
customer_reviews.author: W. WATTERS

customer_reviews.title: Great Vegan Jerky
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a big mushroom person but this Shiitake Mushroom jerky has a nice mild spicy kick to it and isn't sticky like other jerky I've tried. It's more filling than expected, travels well - great for energy while on-the-go. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S. reviews

customer_reviews.title: I love that there are 10gof protein per serving and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty strips, convenient as an on-the-go snack. I love that there are 10gof protein per serving and the Thai Peanut flavor is delicious. Note: there are occasional strips I have gotten which are really dry/chewy and don't have much flavor on them. This seems to be a fluke as I have only gotten 2 or so like that, out of the 40 or so that I have eaten. I absolutely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Very bad batch & not returnable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this twice before and was happy. This batch is gross - wet and seems to have a plasticky covering on the strips, making them unedible. I'm writing this just so folks will know because I just realized THESE ARE NOT RETURNABLE, so I'm out $30, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: OmManiPadmeHum

customer_reviews.title: Great product, weaker of the flavors.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Primal Jerky junkie. I love them so much. But I was disappointed in this particular flavor. It's not bad but it's definitely not Thai Peanut. It's very light on peanut flavor and zero Thai influence. Again, not gross or bad, just not what you'd expect.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy G.

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this brand. These taste excellent, have a low fat / calorie content and 10grams of protein per individual wrapped jerky. I'm a customer for life. Thanks for such an awesome product!!!
customer_reviews.author: T.L.

customer_reviews.title: Yummy! Yummy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and the Texas BBQ flavor is the best in my opinion. I use to stock up on this from a store about an hour away. No more. I’ll be ordering it right from here. I love having this for a pre or post workout snack! It is Yum-O!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Very tasty
customer_reviews.text: I am a vegetarian and have tried all available flavors of Primal Strips. This is so far my top pick, followed by Texas Barbecue and Hickory Smoked. I've been a vegetarian for long enough to very vaguely remember the taste of real jerky, but these taste delicious! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fleur-de-lis

customer_reviews.title: Satisfies the meat eater!
customer_reviews.text: I think this jerky is excellent even for some one that grew up eating meat. Now that I am vegetarian there are times I just feel like a bite of meat would be nice. This totally fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Beth McKinley

customer_reviews.title: Animalistic need for Primal
customer_reviews.text: I’m not vegan but these are a perfect alternative meat snack. I use to get them at Whole Foods but they stopped selling them. I was frustrated. I took a long shot and went to Amazon. There’s my sweet tangy treat. I keep them in the car for long drives. It stops me from going through the drive thru.
customer_reviews.author: Angi

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as potential snacks (during covid) or hurricane preparedness foods. I’ve had them now and then and I have to say they are absolutely delicious! I would recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: The packages can be a challenge to get into sometimes, but I absolutely love these things. High fives for gluten! It has texture like beef and this flavor is mine and my daughters alltime favorite.
customer_reviews.author: MizTerry

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous treat!
customer_reviews.text: All the Primal Spirit jerkies are great, but the Teriyaki is SO delicious, I won't even be buying any other flavors. I have to store it out of sight so I only eat one package at a time.
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: A diamond in the vegan jerky rough!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Myself and my 10 year old son are both vegans, always looking for a yummy snack that travels easy and doesn't need to be refrigerated. This is it for sure... if my 10 year old likes it, it must be delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: I uave tried a few brands of vegan jerky, this one is by far one of the best that I've tasted. I live the taste and texture. Will definitely buy more
customer_reviews.author: S.  Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great Vegan Jerky!
customer_reviews.text: It's so easy to be vegan. There is vegan everything these days! I love these grab and go - Vegan Jerky strips from Primal. The Texas BBQ are my favorite flavor... however, I won't turn down the other flavors they offer. Quite delicious. And, no animal was harmed.... the best part, of course! Go Vegan!
customer_reviews.author: AbelElias

customer_reviews.title: Love it - great flavor, great texture, great healthy snack
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff - and this is my favorite flavor. Note: take SMALL bites... you have to chew this stuff FOREVER - if you take a large bite (or half the 'stick') you may not love it... I have a thing with texture, and if I bite off a large chunk, something about chewing it for so long makes it feel gross. (Never have the problem with small bites.)
customer_reviews.author: J. Salzenstein

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious and they are the perfect snack to keep in your purse for when you are out and too busy to eat. I've been eating one most days for 6 months and I'm still not tired of them. Thai peanut is my favorite flavor but the hickory smoked and the spicy flavors are close runner ups!
customer_reviews.author: Kaity

customer_reviews.title: Texas BBQ is where it's at
customer_reviews.text: Texas BBQ is hands down the best flavor of these. We are living in a society where more vegan products are being made and it's fantastic. This vegan jerky it's my favorite snack hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great snack
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be a delicious, filling snack. A perfect grab and go snack with 11gms of protein per serving. This will be my new snack on the run. It's tasty and filling.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Delicious protein-packed snack
customer_reviews.text: These primal sticks are vegan 'jerkey' that make a perfect portable savory snack. They're packed with protein and all the flavors are great!
customer_reviews.author: Mile Long TBR

customer_reviews.title: they are thus the perfect snack to keep stashed in your drawer at the ...
customer_reviews.text: Just look at the nutritional facts: low-calorie, high-protein food. These have a long shelf-life and don't require refrigeration; they are thus the perfect snack to keep stashed in your drawer at the office or in your day-bag. The main selling point for me is that they're vegan so I can snack with a good conscience :)
customer_reviews.author: DLovVan

customer_reviews.title: Not kosher
customer_reviews.text: Why the heck is this box different than the one on primal Spirits website this is supposed to be kosher and have a star k on it. Every website I’ve evert ordered from Has the star k on it. So disgusting for someone like myself to only eat kosher and then get this product and it not have the kosher label on it shame on you. Why is this box different than the real one. So upset I cannot return this.
customer_reviews.author: Nechama B.

customer_reviews.title: probably my favorite primal spirit jerky
customer_reviews.text: I love all the primal spirits, particularly Texas BBQ and Mesquite Lime, but I really love the texture this one provides that wheat gluten doesn't. So tasty.
customer_reviews.author: bfb84

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Hickory
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Hickory Smoke flavor. It's actually really strongly flavored, I was surprised. It was almost too intense.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Nom nom nom!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little weirded out by the texture at first but its really delicious! After I finished the first one I had to pace myself so I didn't polish off the box! I recommend these to all my friends, vegan or not.
customer_reviews.author: Tricky_Peanut

customer_reviews.title: I like it, but probably won't purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Great source of protein and a quick snack to throw in my bag. I probably won't purchase again: I don't like that it easily gets stuck in my teeth, it has a bit of a funny smell, and the teriyaki flavor it a 6 or 7 out of 10. I think some of the other flavors might be better.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These are so yummy! I had been ordering for several years directly from the manufacturer but since they no longer sell to individuals they directed me to Amazon. I found the pricing about the same, but still a lot cheaper then buying strips individually from health food stores. I have tried all the flavors and hands down the Thai Peanut are my favorite. If you are unsure on a flavor do yourself a favor and order a sampler pack first. It may cost you few bucks but its better then having a case in your pantry that you don't like. Trust me on this :-)
customer_reviews.author: teamweber

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and On Time!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite flavor so I'm super happy you can get it online! It came right on time, the box was open for some reason but there were 24 in the case, as advertised. They are delicious and great sources of protein! Will definitely order again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Giovanna

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Flavor of Primal
customer_reviews.text: I've tried all the Primal Jerkies and this one is my favorite. I like the texture the best and it's got a hint of sweet and spicy flavor. I love it in my salads and it's the best one to eat plain. However there is one caveat - the Primal packages are horrible to try and open. Rarely do I ever get the package to open perfectly, the plastic strip either tears off or it opens just a tiny amount. You don't want to try and open it with scissors either unless you are prepared to clean them afterwards. Bottom line though the effort is worth it! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: High protein, tasty
customer_reviews.text: 10g protein for 99 calories. Tastes so good. There's a lot of sodium, but that's obvious. One of my favorite snacks. I just wish it was a little cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: yum!
customer_reviews.text: I like that these are individually packaged because I cant bring a whole bag into work. This is my favorite flavor they make!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: best flavor
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 24 pack because I think it's the best value you can get on these primal strips in store or online. To me the hickory flavor is the only one palatable enough to purchase in any quantity.
customer_reviews.author: PhilliesChick

customer_reviews.title: Made me want to VOMIT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the worst thing i’ve ever eaten. There was NO perceivable teriyaki flavor, and it was slimy for some reason. If you’re going to make vegan jerky then at least make it resemble jerky, not a lubed up strip of raw testicle skin.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter love this particular flavor
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love this particular flavor, but loves them allo! Sent to her 3 times!!
customer_reviews.author: Mac MacChlerie

customer_reviews.title: not tasty
customer_reviews.text: Reading all the reviews I expected more from this product. The flavor is really bad. To be fair I have not tried other vegan options to see how this one compares to the rest. I was looking for a high protein meat substitute and this is certainly not it!
customer_reviews.author: Zeebra

customer_reviews.title: Excited
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to see this on Amazon!! All of my local store stop carrying them and I was sad. The flavor is incredible and it makes for a great snack!!
customer_reviews.author: Yunyy

customer_reviews.title: Great protein-packed vegan snack
customer_reviews.text: This vegan jerky is delicious! It also has 11 grams of protein which makes it a very satisfying snack on the go (especially post-workout). I will admit that the first one I ate, I was a little unsure about but soon after I couldn't stop eating it! It has a similar texture to meat, which was surprising. Delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B

customer_reviews.title: Superior product!!
customer_reviews.text: Low calorie, high protein snack - sounds boring, right? These vegan jerky snacks are one of the best-tasting snacks I've found in 7 years of my strict vegan lifestyle. I am already planning to reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne LaMarre

customer_reviews.title: I hated these. I'm not giving less stars because I ...
customer_reviews.text: I'll be honest: I hated these. I'm not giving less stars because I feel like that's just my opinion, and plenty of people will like them. They're really easy protein, and there were so many reviews that made it seem like they were amazing. They were ok the first few times, maybe because I wanted to like them, but eventually I couldn't take a bite without wanting to puke. I've seen them at whole foods stores before, so maybe try them individual before getting them in bulk from here (which is a good deal).
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: these are amazing. they taste even better than meat (and since ...
customer_reviews.text: oh. my. god. these are amazing. they taste even better than meat (and since they are meatless they are healthier). AND it's CHEAPER than my meat jerky sticks. please don't go away or I'll cry.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Tastes so good
customer_reviews.text: I don't eat meat for moral reasons, but I miss the taste of meat. This is a wonderful substitute!
customer_reviews.author: C. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Must try
customer_reviews.text: I freakin’ love this product. I’m glad I was able to find a vegan alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yum, Yum, Yum
customer_reviews.text: My husband love this and the spicy flavor (they're all really delicious!). We love how flavorful they are, the texture is great, and we like adding them to snack/lunch packs for work, when we run errands, take road trips, flights, etc. Very convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: This is a bit on the expensive side but is delicious! Moist and chewy. Very flavorful. Ordering more now!
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: thai peanut tastes off
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the teriyaki flavor. Since it wasn't available for prime I thought I try a new flavor. The thai peanut tastes a bit off. I have to eat it quickly or eat it with something/ water as by itself it tastes to peanut buttery for jerky. I really don't like eating it.
customer_reviews.author: Aggie O

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor, high protein
customer_reviews.text: Really like the flavor. High protein. The price was very fair for the amount I got. I have recommended this to other vegetarians. Overall, pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great snack for on the go moms!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this! I am a vegetarian and a mom that loves to have something in her purse for weak moments! This totally fits the bill. I looked on the Primal Spirit website before ordering to see the differences in nutritional content between all of the flavors and I was surprised that there was quite a difference. I ended up choosing the Texas Barbecue because it equaled 2 Weight Watchers points and was the lowest in calories. They are definitely pricey but in my mind totally worth it. A lot come in a box and they are a great snack to carry with you!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ashcroft

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: Great meatless protein snack or addition to meal. Tasty, great meat like texture, and super convenient. My only complaint is I always fight with opening the package, but that won't deter me.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: sooooo good
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy these all the time in college, and I'm so happy they are on Amazon now. They contain 10g of protein per 1oz serving, which is pretty good if you are worried about your protein intake. This flavor is also great. They aren't dry like meat jerky, they are slightly slimy but truthfully I love the texture as much as the flavor. I just ate 3 of these when I promised myself I'd only eat 1 a day to make them last longer. Oh well!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Great jerky alternative for veggies!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! I often order it just to have a little snack on hand that I can throw in my bag to take with me to work or on errands. I have tried the other flavors and I like them but this is definitely my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Watergurl

customer_reviews.title: Yucks
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have gotten the mixed variety to try out because this one is yucky .. it’s too soggy to be jerky .. to wetish
customer_reviews.author: claudia perex

customer_reviews.title: Good taste and texture
customer_reviews.text: I really like the taste and texture, has been one if the best vegetarian jerkies I've tried. Reminds me of the real thing. I'll continue to buy this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: They have a great flavor, perfect for a snack in my lunch bag at work!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Regn

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and healthy
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best vegan jerky my son and I like. We will keep coming back.
customer_reviews.author: MLP

customer_reviews.title: A Vegan must have
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two boxes of these now and love them. My first box came from a local health food store and the second came from Amazon. Yum Yum. As a Vegan I never heard of these, but I have seen them on the shelf at my local health food store. So one day I bought two packs. I loved them. Went back and bought the rest of the box. That store could not get them in fast enough so I bought from Amazon. I really like them. The lime flavor is the one that I have tried. I will try the other flavors soon.
customer_reviews.author: concordenerd

customer_reviews.title: Yes, even good to full-on meateaters...
customer_reviews.text: First bought these for my vegetarian daughter, upon her request, and she had the whole family sampling them and clamoring for more. Now, years later, she's no longer a vegetarian, and STILL wants these for her birthday now and then. These are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Texture like real jerky
customer_reviews.text: Texture is so similar to real, you'll never know. Which may throw some people off. But its a better alternative to real jerky
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great product & excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I've tried the teriyaki & hickory smoked. The teriyaki took a few tries to get used to mainly because the texture. The hickory flavor was a hit! Not only did we love it, so did my 18mo old & 2&a half year old kids. Customer service was amazing!! Very quick to respond!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: a little getting used to but good
customer_reviews.text: I am a long time veg occasional vegan. I have been looking for a vegan jerky product for a while. I forgot that I ordered the seitan not soy jerky. Service was excellent - my order arrived within three days of ordering - and I live in AZ! I was a bit taken aback by the texture - but after trying one I really liked it. good taste very digestible and satisfying.Flavor is not as strong as you might expect for teryiaki but it is pleasing. I will definitely try other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Texas Barbeque flavor
customer_reviews.text: So...it's not identical in texture to beef jerky ...but it's really close. With that aside., as its own thing it's really delicious. I'm vegetarian and finding this product was like hitting gold. I'm camping at a festival soon and need easy non perishable foods that will satisfy my hunger and these are perfect. Texture: A bit soft, yet very chewy (Almost like pulled pork?) Flavor: I've only tried the Texas Barbeque, but the flavor is on point. Very juicy, sweet, and smokey. Would I recommend them? Yes, I would.
customer_reviews.author: VG

customer_reviews.title: Great taste- No Meat Needed
customer_reviews.text: The texture and flavor of this jerky is amazing. I'm pretty sure you could fool a meat eater with this.
customer_reviews.author: Mamiedale

customer_reviews.title: I like them and  have re- ordered
customer_reviews.text: I love these for a quick on the go food. Lots of flavor too. Relatively good amount of protein. Satisfying chewiness. I just ordered another 24 ct. today as a matter of fact.
customer_reviews.author: D. Klipper

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but good!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They give you something to chew on and have a wonderful flavor! they are very expensive though, so beware!! being all natural is major bonus, and we would not buy them if they weren't
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Gorga

customer_reviews.title: Protein snack
customer_reviews.text: This is my wife's go to protein snack.high protein, no soy
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A Hitchcock

customer_reviews.title: Just okay, some too tough/dry to enjoy
customer_reviews.text: These are a great ratio of protein to low calories and low carbohydrates for people tracking macros or calories in general. Usually, they are quite tasty but several of the jerkeys in this box have been hard and dry. Some of them are the normal chewy and flavorful jerky, but half so far have been overly tough and very dry. I'm not sure if they are old but the expiration date is in 2019.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C.

customer_reviews.title: A high protein, tasty vegan snack.
customer_reviews.text: LISTEN, you cannot beat the flavor. It’s stringy, almost like actual beef. It tastes great! I could take more lime flavor, but that’s just me being picky. At 74 calories and high protein, I absolutely love this snack. You won’t regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgett

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a box of the Mesquite Lime after finding the Texas BBQ at my local organic grocery store. I love both flavors but am glad I got a bulk of the lime. It's delicious! I love that its only 75 calories and yet so high in protein. It's hard for me (as a vegetarian) to get enough protein while still keeping my carbs low. The standard protein bar usually has way too much sugar for my liking. These are a great afternoon snack and perfect after an intense workout.
customer_reviews.author: KAW

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and cruelty free?!?
customer_reviews.text: These are so so yummy! My absolutely favorite vegan jerky! Nothing else compares! The flavor is so good and the texture is spot on when I’m craving jerky! My husband (not a vegetarian) loves these too!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha H.

customer_reviews.title: Super portable vegan snack
customer_reviews.text: As a vegan, its important to always have snacks on the go since you never know if you'll find something to eat. These are great because they are filling, low calorie, and have a long shelf life. I've tried all the flavors and find Hickory Smoked to be my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Jon F

customer_reviews.title: Vegan  beef jerky
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! Started sending to friends and they live them too
customer_reviews.author: SAB

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and texture
customer_reviews.text: The teriyaki seitan strips have great smoky/sweet barbecue taste and a nice stringy, "pulled" texture. They're full of protein and 100 calories each (I wish it were even a little less), which makes for a great snack. They dont't taste like beef jerky, but it's not supposed to. They're isolated soy-free (there's a little soy from the soy sauce in it), as the base is vital wheat gluten. I carry one in my purse all the time just in case I get hungry.
customer_reviews.author: Laur

customer_reviews.title: YUMMMMMMM
customer_reviews.text: Even my meat eating friends love the flavor of these things. I cant get enough of these. I have to stop myself from eating them all. They are a great snack and the flavor is quite good. The texture of these are great, the flavor is great, and they make a good snack on the go. If you want something that will tide you over from lunch to dinner these are the way to go. Or, if you are a college student that wants a snack between classes, throw a couple of these in your bag. We all know how hard it is to find good vegan snacks with a little substance. These a perfect.
customer_reviews.author: kevin watson

customer_reviews.title: Oops, they're gone already...
customer_reviews.text: These are really good and hit the spot if you are someone that enjoys meaty flavor but without the meat.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly tasty
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Easy to grab and go for a protein snack. Often the vegan lunch options at meetings are limited to salad and having these stashed at work keeps me prepared.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Moore

product_meta.title: Primal Spirit Vegan Jerky – “Classic Flavor” – Texas BBQ, 10 g. Plant Based Protein, Certified Non-GMO, No Preservatives, Sports Friendly Packaging (24 Pack, 1 oz)
feature_bullets: BEST TASTE & BEST TEXTURE & BEST PRICE - Voted Best New Vegan Snack by both PETA and VegNews. Finally, a cruelty-free jerky in all the “classic” flavors that you can really sink your teeth into.

SUSTAINABLY SOURCED & CRUELTY-FREE - Animal rights activists for decades, owners of Primal Spirit Foods dedicated themselves to creating healthy, high-quality, vegan alternatives as a way to act more harmoniously with our environment & all living beings.

10 GRAMS OF HIGH ENERGY PLANT-PROTEIN - A favorite of protein hungry bikers, climbers, & active people our unique single serving, sports-friendly package contains 10g of plant-based protein without the use of any preservatives or artificial ingredients.
OUR “PREMIER” VEGAN JERKY made from high energy, non GMO CERTIFIED Soy in the “CLASSIC” American flavor favorite, Texas BBQ
